author: J14T14
title: LEGOÂ® Buildable Ruler Review
review:
I first found out about this while watching a review on it by the Youtuber  JANGBRiCKS. I thought that it was really cool, so I asked for it for my birthday. I wasn't disappointed.

When building this, you can build a 6" version or a 12" version. There are printed pieces for both options. The 4x20 green base plates are nice to have, but they seem to have been cut. There are a fes 2x4 plated of various colors, one light gray 2/16, and two white 2x12 plates.

Overall, this is a really nice set. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a cool little LEGO made thing that can be used for real life situations.
